security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only skill containing workflow guidance and structured prompts for AI assistants. No executable code, scripts, or network operations. All actual data operations are delegated to the Linear MCP server which requires user authentication via OAuth.

content.user_title: Manage Linear issues, projects, and team workflows
content.value_statement: Users need structured workflows for managing project management tasks in Linear. This skill provides consistent integration with Linear MCP for issue tracking, sprint planning, and team collaboration.
actual_capabilities: List, create, update, and search issues across projects and teams
Manage project milestones, cycles, and release planning
Track team workload and balance assignments automatically
Create and manage documentation with collaborative comments
Execute structured workflows for sprint planning and retrospectives
Apply smart labeling and bulk status updates
limitations: Requires Linear MCP server connected via OAuth authentication
Access limited to Linear workspaces the user has permission to view
API rate limits apply to bulk operations and frequent queries

use_cases.title: Sprint Planning & Tracking
use_cases.description: Plan sprints, assign issues, track team velocity, and manage release milestones across projects

use_cases.title: Bug Triage & Issue Management
use_cases.description: Find and prioritize bugs, update issue status, track blockers, and coordinate with team members

use_cases.title: Workload Distribution
use_cases.description: Analyze active issues by assignee, identify overloaded team members, and redistribute work fairly

prompt_templates.title: Quick Issue List
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all issues assigned to me that are currently in progress or need review. Group them by priority.

prompt_templates.title: Sprint Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me plan the next sprint for team Engineering. List all open high-priority issues, suggest top items for the sprint, and create a new cycle.

prompt_templates.title: Bug Triage
prompt_templates.prompt: List all critical and high-priority bugs in the project. Rank them by user impact, identify top three to fix first, and move them to In Progress.

prompt_templates.title: Workload Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze current workload across the team. Group issues by assignee, flag anyone with more than five active issues, and suggest redistributions.

best_practices: Clarify user intent and scope before starting any Linear operations
Batch related operations together to reduce API calls and improve efficiency
Always verify workspace access and permissions before attempting changes
anti_patterns: Skipping prerequisite setup steps like Linear MCP configuration
Making assumptions about issue IDs, team keys, or project scopes without verification
Running large bulk operations without checking rate limits or breaking into smaller batches

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires Linear MCP server configured in your AI tool settings.

faq.question: What are the API rate limits?
faq.answer: Linear applies standard API rate limits. The skill recommends batching operations and using specific filters to stay within limits.

faq.question: Can I use this with multiple Linear workspaces?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill accesses workspaces your authenticated user has permission to view. OAuth determines access scope.

faq.question: Is my Linear data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. All data flows through Linear's official MCP server with your OAuth credentials. The skill only orchestrates workflow.

faq.question: What if I cannot access certain projects?
faq.answer: The skill only accesses workspaces and projects your Linear account has permission to view. Request access from your workspace admin.

faq.question: How does this compare to Linear CLI?
faq.answer: This skill provides AI-powered natural language interface. The CLI offers direct command-line access. Both work together for different workflows.
